meanings.definition: More squooshy or soft when squeezed or pressed.
meanings.sent1: The pillow felt squooshier after fluffing it up.
meanings.sent2: Her teddy bear was squooshier than mine.
meanings.sent3: The marshmallow became even squooshier when left out in the sun.
meanings.sent4: The mud was so squooshier, it felt like walking on clouds.
meanings.sent5: The ripe peach was squooshier than a sponge, bursting with juice.

meanings.definition: Comparatively squooshy or soft when squeezed or pressed.
meanings.sent1: The new blanket was squooshier than the old one.
meanings.sent2: The puppy's fur was squooshier after a bath.
meanings.sent3: The cake was so squooshier, it melted in your mouth.
meanings.sent4: The snow was squooshier than a feather, making it perfect for snowballs.
meanings.sent5: The cotton candy was squooshier than a cloud, dissolving instantly on the tongue.
